message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I think $150 is a bit steep. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think $100 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, how about $125?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $110?
I'm still a bit far apart, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $128?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
